attributes.action: Stop Hinckley Council from building the new leisure centre in Argents Mead
attributes.additional_details:
Hickley council are planning to build the new leisure centre in Argents Mead on the site of the old council offices,
The town already struggles to cope with parking in this area.
There are better sites for this development located close to the current building.
The Mead is the only open green space in the centre of Hinckley town,
Traffic levels will increase on roads tha were never designed to cope with large numbers of traffic that will only get worse when the new Crescent development gets built (I belive Highways dept has already raised concerns)
